meanings.definition: A spread or layer of something, such as cream cheese or butter, on bread or a bagel.
meanings.sent1: I love to put a schmeer of peanut butter on my toast in the morning.
meanings.sent2: She always adds a generous schmeer of jam to her scones.
meanings.sent3: The cat walked across the table, leaving a schmeer of paw prints in the butter.
meanings.sent4: The artist carefully applied a colorful schmeer of paint onto the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The chef topped the dish with a flavorful schmeer of herb-infused oil.

meanings.definition: To spread or smear something thickly or messily.
meanings.sent1: Please schmeer the cream cheese evenly on the bagel.
meanings.sent2: He schmeered sunscreen all over his body before going to the beach.
meanings.sent3: The kids schmeered paint on the walls during their art project.
meanings.sent4: She schmeered the glue messily across the paper to stick the pieces together.
meanings.sent5: The chef schmeered the sauce on the plate to create an artistic presentation.

meanings.definition: A large amount or quantity of something.
meanings.sent1: There was a schmeer of paperwork waiting for me on my desk.
meanings.sent2: He had a schmeer of toppings on his ice cream sundae.
meanings.sent3: The party had a schmeer of delicious snacks for everyone to enjoy.
meanings.sent4: She received a schmeer of compliments on her performance.
meanings.sent5: The garden was filled with a schmeer of colorful flowers in full bloom.
